headline: Global Payments to Report Second Quarter Results on August 6, 2025
summary: ATLANTA, July 23, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN) will release second quarter financial results before the market opens on Wednesday, August 6, 2025.

raw.headline: Global Payments to Report Second Quarter Results on August 6, 2025
raw.summary: ATLANTA, July 23, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN) will release second quarter financial results before the market opens on Wednesday, August 6, 2025.

headline: Global Payments price target raised to $83 from $79 at Truist
summary: Truist raised the firm’s price target on Global Payments (GPN) to $83 from $79 and keeps a Hold rating on the shares. Truist likes the setup for the FinTech sector as earnings results in totality should be solid, and the group has underperformed of late, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
